dcterms:creator: A. Ramalingam
S. Kedari
C. Vuppalapati
dcterms:description: A large-scale database containing continuous speech recordings collected by the speech clinic of Far Eastern Memorial Hospital from 2012 to 2019, used for classifying four common voice disorders.
dcterms:title: FEMH voice disorder database

dcterms:creator: A. Ramalingam
S. Kedari
C. Vuppalapati
dcterms:description: A balanced dataset published for an international competition, containing voice samples classified into neoplasm, phonotrauma, and vocal palsy, used for evaluating voice disorder detection systems.
dcterms:title: FEMH-Challenge database
